template_data.thumb|alt: Gaunt humanoid figure made of darkness, with blue and red stars inside it. It is draped with a tattered blue robe.]]

document_data.name: Maw of Acamar
document_data.mainbody: '''Maws of Acamar''' were a type of [[star spawn]] created by the dead star [[Acamar]].
document_data.Description: Maws of Acamar were large, humanoid-shaped, and inky-black in color. Their solidity or lack thereof was unknown.
document_data.Abilities: Maws of Acamar had some strange powers that pulled creatures towards them, before destroying them as if in a void.
document_data.Combat: These star spawn relied solely on their innate magics in battle.
document_data.Ecology:
Maws of Acamar were said to be the corpse star's hunger made manifest, and certainly, those enemies they killed were torn apart and pulled into Acamar's own darkness. They entered the world when Acamar's influence peaked and then proceeded to destroy/eat everything in their path.
<!--==History==
[[Malyanna]] could turn into a Maw of Acamar...-->
